title: Game crashing
body: I started up my game and it instantly crashes. I go to reconnect and it gives me an internet error. I now can not log into the launcher. Please help me, I am doing a full repair right now to see if that helps. If there is anything else please help.

replies.body: I'd like to help you out, but I need more specifics on your issue.  What are these errors saying when the game crashed or trying to open the client?  Was the game crash a bugsplat?
When I am trying to log into the game it keeps saying that I have incorrect password but when I logged in on here I am perfectly fine.

Thanks, that helps clear things up a lot!  We're currently tracking this issue in our [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)post up top.  The cause of the issue looks to be a patch mismatch, meaning you're not on the same version as anyone else.  If restarting didn't help, try a force repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).

These manual steps might help as well:
Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
Save the file.
Restart the client.

Let me know if that works for you.
And if I have any ques what can yall do about that.

When I am trying to log into the game it keeps saying that I have incorrect password but when I logged in on here I am perfectly fine.
The game just popped up with the wait for it to respond or close. I waited for 5 minutes and nothing happened so I closed it. When I went to reconnect to the game it would give an error says the internet connection was not connecting. But I had a buddy that was playing with me not even 2 minutes away from my house using the same internet and server.
